ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: If( RecordTypeId ='01211000002K3LtAAK' ,If( INCLUDES(Solution_Type__c, '100 BC Eng') || INCLUDES(Solution_Type__c, 'ARC Core Eng') , ISNULL( Implementing_Grades__c ) ,false ),false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill out the 'Implementing Grades' field for this validation.
